products.name: Celeste Pizza For One Deluxe Microwave

extendedInfo.detail: Deluxe with sausage, green and red peppers & mushrooms. Sausage made with pork, chicken added.  Authentic Italian since 1930. Pizza for one. Microwaves in minutes! See cooking instructions. Celeste pizza for one brings generations of authentic Italian taste and quality. Savor every bite with mama's zesty sauce, bursting with the flavor of plump tomatoes and just the right amount of spices and popular toppings. SmartLabel: Scan for more food information or call 1-800-768-6287.  Questions or comments, visit us at www.celestepizza.com or call 1-800-768-6287.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Crust (Wheat Flour [Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour], Water, Shortening Flake [Palm Oil, Soy Lecithin, Natural Butter Flavor And Beta Carotene {Color}], Soybean Oil, Yeast, Corn Starch, Sugar, Salt, Dough Conditioner [Barley Malt Extract. Inactive Yeast, Enzymes, Enriched Wheat Flour {Wheat Flour, Niacin, Reduced Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid}], Vital Wheat Gluten), Topping (Imitation Mozzarella Blend [Imitation Mozzarella {Water, Palm Oil, Modified Potato Starch, Rennet Casein, Modified Corn Starch, Sodium Citrate, Salt, Sodium Phosphate, Natural Flavor, Carrageenan, Lactic Acid, Artificial Color}, Mozzarella (Pasteurized Cultured Reduced Fat Milk, Salt, Enzymes}], Cooked Sausage Made With Pork- Chicken Added [Pork, Mechanically Separated Chicken, Water, Seasonings {Spices, Salt, Dextrose, Paprika, BHT, TBHQ, Citric Acid}], Green Bell Peppers, Mushrooms, Red Bell Peppers), Sauce (Water, Tomato Puree [Water, Tomato Paste], Seasoning [Salt, Spices, Sugar, Dehydrated Garlic], Flavor Blend [Maltodextrin, Dextrose, Natural Spice Oleoresins], Salt, Modified Corn Starch, Soybean Oil, Xanthan Gum).
extendedInfo.directions: Simply cook and serve. Cook thoroughly. Keep frozen. For food safety and quality, cook to a temperature of 165 degrees F. Celeste has a traditional crust that cooks up in the microwave without a heating disk! For a crispier crust, follow conventional oven directions. Conventional Oven (Preferred method of cooking. Do not prepare in toaster oven): 1. Preheat oven to 400 degree F. 2. Remove pizza from wrapper. 3. Place on baking sheet and bake 16 minutes. 4. Handle carefully; it's hot! Check that food is cooked thoroughly to 165 degrees F. Enjoy! Microwave Oven (Cook only one at a time): 1. Remove pizza from carton; unwrap. Place on microwave-safe plate. 2. Microwave on high 2 minutes to 2 minutes 30 seconds. 3. Let stand in microwave 1 minute before serving. Handle carefully; it's hot! Check that food is cooked thoroughly to 165 degree F. Enjoy! For Food safety and Quality: Keep frozen until ready to use. Microwave directions developed with 1100-watt microwave ovens. Appliances vary. Adjust heating times as needed. Food must be cooked thoroughly to 165 degrees F.  Keep frozen.  Lift to open.
extendedInfo.warnings: Contains: wheat, soy, milk.Do not purchase if carton is open or torn.
